item.title: Docker registry - operations on API
item.description: Instead of using Docker CLI commands - we can communicate with Docker registry with GET/POST methods of Docker Registry HTTP API. Post include information for V2 of API. Example setup For our examples we use docker private registry in container. Currently we have got alpine image and couple of ubuntu images loaded in it. item.title: Docker private registry - setup
item.description: It is very common to setup own Docker registry for our private images.
